ai_opportunities.name: Automated Booking & Scheduling
ai_opportunities.description: Online booking system with availability sync

value_created.description: 24/7 booking capability, fewer no-shows, professional image

custom_solution.approach: Custom booking portal integrated with your workflow

roi_example.scenario: Studio doing 30 sessions/month, 2 hours admin per booking

ai_opportunities.honest_assessment: This is a no-brainer for any studio doing 10+ sessions/month. Massive ROI.

ai_opportunities.name: AI Audio Cleanup & Restoration
ai_opportunities.description: Use AI tools for noise reduction, dialogue cleanup, restoration

value_created.description: Take on more restoration work, faster turnarounds

custom_solution.approach: Custom AI models for your specific workflows
cons: Rarely necessary - existing tools are excellent

ai_opportunities.honest_assessment: If you don't have iZotope RX yet, get it. Industry standard for a reason.

ai_opportunities.name: Automated File & Backup Management
ai_opportunities.description: Systematic file organization, automated backups, archiving

value_created.description: Peace of mind, faster project recall, professional delivery

custom_solution.approach: Custom automation scripts for your naming conventions

ai_opportunities.honest_assessment: Start with basics (cloud backup + consistent naming). Only upgrade if you're drowning.

ai_opportunities.name: AI Stem Separation
ai_opportunities.description: Separate vocals, drums, bass, etc. from mixed tracks

value_saved.description: Work from references without original stems

value_created.description: New service offerings: remixes, covers, sample creation

custom_solution.approach: Train custom model for your specific use case
cons: Rarely needed - existing tools are good

ai_opportunities.honest_assessment: Quality is 'good enough' for many applications now. Try LALAL.AI first (cheap) before investing more.

not_recommended.name: AI mixing/mastering as primary service
not_recommended.reason: Your human expertise IS the value. AI-assisted is fine, AI-replacement kills your differentiation.

not_recommended.name: Full automation of client communication
not_recommended.reason: Music is personal. Clients expect a human relationship.

not_recommended.name: AI composition tools as client-facing service
not_recommended.reason: Ethical and legal grey area. Use for sketching only.

industry_specific_advice: Music studios: Your ears and creative judgment are irreplaceable. Use AI for the tedious stuff (cleanup, scheduling, admin) so you can spend more time on the creative work that clients actually pay for.
